title: Making Your Expectations Clear
itunes:author: Guest: Randy Schroeder
itunes:summary:
While no spouse can meet all of your dreams and desires, it's still important to make your expectations clear. Without sharing what you're expecting, you'll be setting yourself up for disappointment. John, Erin and Greg describe how they've seen unexpressed expectations cause tension in a marriage. Featuring Dr. Randy Schroeder.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

Receive the book "Simple Habits for Marital Happiness" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-07-05?recd=1436203

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/making-expectations-clear/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/simple-habits-to-embrace-in-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1436203

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
